TopicTitle: How do I edit parts on a Mac?

Articles.Content: I want to adjust the weight of a few parts, but don't know how to open up the files. I'm on a Mac, if it makes a difference.
In your KSP_osx folder, the default parts are in GameData/Squad/Parts.
Yeah, but then how do I open up the editor to edit stuff like their mass or thrust?
Open it with a plain text editor. The files are all plain text.
